articles.author: Heba Saleh
articles.title: Dozens die in Algerian wildfires as temperatures soar towards 50C - Financial Times
articles.description: Blistering heat across Mediterranean region spreads to dry and mountainous parts of north Africa
articles.content: Wildfires have killed 34 people in Algeria and spread to Tunisia as a heatwave that has swept across the Mediterranean region sparked devastating flames that the authorities have struggled to control… [+2864 chars]
